amendment.description: Amendment mandates river watershed areas to be considered as eligible and as priorities to receive funding from the Abandoned Locatable Minerals Mine Reclamation Fund.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 3 printed in House Report 110-416 to state that river watershed areas may be considered as eligible and as priorities to receive funding from the Abandoned Locatable Minerals Mine Reclamation Fund.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Matsui amendment (A003) Agreed to by voice vote.
